page.title: 20 ACKNOWLEDGMENTS.
page.content: Children of the junior section of Denton County Primary School were responsibe for collecting most of this information.The age range of those involved was 8-11 years. The object was to give as wide a view as possible of life in a village in Norhtamptonshire in the 1980s. Adult help was needed in transporting the pupils to visit farms etc;Thanks should therefore be recorded to all those willing volunteers who gave their time or gave information for the project. Thanks should also be recorded to army personnel who gave permission for the visit to Yardley Chase and members of the Northamptonshire Trust for Nature Conservation who accompanied the trip. (See pages 18 & 19).
